name: TeslaPWControl
description: Nodeserver to allow integration of Tesla Power Wall Control. ShortPoll updates critical data and  heartbeat, long poll is for all data.  Daily Totals are logged to file in directory dailyData
notice: Uses on https://github.com/jrester/tesla_powerwall API - not official Tesla API

credits.title: A NodeServer to integrate Tesla Power Wall Controll system
credits.author: Panda88CO
credits.license: Uses https://github.com/jrester/tesla_powerwall (MIT license). This code is also under MIT license
